overview:
CRM Text Solutions provide the only cost-effective solution for natural language, two-way SMS for every SME in the U.S. while creating a unified opt-in database for each SME.

CRM Text Solutions provides SOAP and REST Application Programming Interface (API) access to its text messaging platform to software and marketing services providers so they can provide two-way SMS to their SME clients. The T-Short Code (T-SC) platform includes a patent-pending method for short code allocation from two pools of CSCs and business process applications for communications, campaigns, calendars and user customization.

Our patent-pending method for short code allocation delivers the reliability of a dedicated short code, which costs $1000/month, for ~$5/month per SME and gives each SME a central opt-in database that can be leverage by any other Vendor on the T-SC platform. We also provide access to vanity short codes NEWCAR, HOMES & LAWYER for keyword-based mobile marketing to initiate opt-ins.
